location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ä€bu] to Narayn Vasedes

mods.abstract: Letter concerning two cases containing cars taken from a bust of Pelly which are en route to Bombay and informing Vasedes that he has instructed the delivery company to send them to him and asking that he accept one as a gift, look after the other which is in the larger case, and send the smaller one to Charles Umpherston Aitchison and also to inform Aitchison to expect it so that he does not mistake it for a cheese box.The letter was originally dated 5 August 1874 however this date has been crossed out by the author and replaced in pencil with 4 August 1874.
